en: University of Science and Technology of China

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省合肥市
location.en: Hefei, Anhui Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 隶属于中国科学院的一所公立研究型大学，是“双一流A类”和原“985工程”、原“211工程”重点建设大学。学校于1958年在北京创办，后于文革期间迁至安徽合肥。
description.en: A public research university affiliated with the Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS), designated as a Double First Class University (Class A) and a former Project 985 and Project 211 key university. It was founded in Beijing in 1958 and later relocated to Hefei, Anhui during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家最高学术机构、科学技术最高咨询机构、自然科学与高技术综合研究发展中心。
description.en: The national academy for natural sciences of the People's Republic of China. It functions as the national scientific think tank and academic governing body, providing advisory and appraisal services on issues stemming from the national economy, social development, and science and technology progress.

description.zh-cn: 中国空气动力学家，中国科学院及中国工程院院士，两弹一星功勋奖章获得者。他是中国科学技术大学的创办人之一。
description.en: An aerospace engineer and cyberneticist who made significant contributions to the field of aerodynamics and established engineering cybernetics. He was one of the founders of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国数学家，中国科学院院士。他是中国解析数论、矩阵几何学、典型群、自守函数论与多元复变函数论等多方面研究的创始人和开拓者，也是中国科学技术大学的创办人之一。
description.en: A Chinese mathematician and politician famous for his important contributions to number theory and for his role as the leader of the mathematics research of the Chinese Academy of Sciences. He was one of the founders of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中国科学院副院长。他代表中国科学院向中央提出创办中国科学技术大学的申请。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Vice President of the Chinese Academy of Sciences. He submitted the application to the central government to establish the University of Science and Technology of China on behalf of CAS.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物。他赞成并支持了中国科学技术大学的创办和后续重点建设。
description.en: A Chinese politician who was the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China from 1978 to 1989. He approved and supported the establishment and subsequent key development of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国文学家、历史学家、社会活动家，曾任中国科学院院长。他是中国科学技术大学的首任校长。
description.en: A Chinese author, poet, historian, archaeologist, and government official. He was the first President of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场政治运动。该运动严重冲击了中国的教育和科研体系。
description.en: A sociopolitical movement in the People's Republic of China. The movement severely impacted China's education and research systems.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与苏联之间在冷战期间发生的政治和意识形态的分歧。这一事件导致了中国的战备疏散政策。
description.en: The breaking of political relations between the People's Republic of China and the Soviet Union during the Cold War. This event led to China's policy of strategic relocation of key facilities.

description.zh-cn: 1986年12月在中国各地爆发的一系列学生运动，始于中国科学技术大学学生对人大代表选举的抗议。
description.en: A series of student demonstrations across China in December 1986, which began with protests by students at the University of Science and Technology of China regarding local People's Congress elections.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家，曾任中国科学技术大学校长，因八六学潮而被撤职。
description.en: A Chinese physicist and former president of the University of Science and Technology of China, who was dismissed from his post following the 1986 student protests.

description.zh-cn: 中国天体物理学家、异议人士，曾任中国科学技术大学副校长，因八六学潮而被撤职。
description.en: A Chinese astrophysicist, vice-president of the University of Science and Technology of China, and dissident. He was dismissed from his post following the 1986 student protests.

description.zh-cn: 英国理论物理学家、宇宙学家及作家。他曾于1985年在中国科学技术大学发表演讲。
description.en: An English theoretical physicist, cosmologist, and author. He gave a speech at the University of Science and Technology of China in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国政协主席。他拥有中国科学技术大学在职研究生学历。
description.en: A retired Chinese politician, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Chairman of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference. He is an alumnus of the University of Science and Technology of China (in-service postgraduate degree).

description.zh-cn: 中国化学家，曾任中国科学技术大学校长，任期长达十年。
description.en: A Chinese chemist and former president of the University of Science and Technology of China, serving for a decade.

description.zh-cn: 原隶属于国家烟草专卖局的一所高校，于1999年12月整建制并入中国科学技术大学。
description.en: A former university affiliated with the State Tobacco Monopoly Administration, which was fully merged into the University of Science and Technology of China in December 1999.

description.zh-cn: 一所已不存在的大学，于1959年8月并入中国科学技术大学。
description.en: A defunct university that was merged into the University of Science and Technology of China in August 1959.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中共中央总书记、国家主席。他曾为中国科学技术大学四十周年校庆题词。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party and President of China. He wrote an inscription for the 40th anniversary of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中共中央总书记、国家主席。他曾为中国科学技术大学五十周年校庆发贺信。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party and President of China. He sent a congratulatory letter for the 50th anniversary of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔物理学家，诺贝尔物理学奖获得者。他主持创办了中国科学技术大学少年班。
description.en: A Chinese-American physicist, who was a Nobel laureate in physics. He presided over the establishment of the Special Class for the Gifted Young at the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院以其科研力量为基础，采取“全院办校，所系结合”的方针创办了中国科学技术大学。
description.en: The Chinese Academy of Sciences founded the University of Science and Technology of China based on its research strengths, adopting the principle of 'running the university with the entire academy, integrating departments and institutes'.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学技术大学隶属于中国科学院，由中国科学院直属管理。
description.en: The University of Science and Technology of China is affiliated with and directly managed by the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要倡议者之一，提议并参与创办中国科学技术大学。
description.en: As one of the main proponents, he proposed and participated in the founding of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要倡议者之一，提议并参与创办中国科学技术大学。
description.en: As one of the main proponents, he proposed and participated in the founding of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国科学院副院长的张劲夫代表科学院向中央提出创办中国科学技术大学的申请。
description.en: Zhang Jinfu, then Vice President of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, submitted the application to the central government to establish the University of Science and Technology of China on behalf of the academy.

description.zh-cn: 郭沫若担任中国科学技术大学的首任校长。
description.en: Guo Moruo served as the first president of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，中国科学技术大学停止招生和正常教学，并于1969年被迫迁出北京，导致图书、器材、教员流失大半，发展受到严重阻碍。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the University of Science and Technology of China halted admissions and regular teaching. In 1969, it was forced to relocate from Beijing, resulting in significant losses of books, equipment, and faculty, which severely hindered its development.

description.zh-cn: 中苏交恶导致的战备疏散要求是中国科学技术大学被迫迁出北京的原因之一，这一搬迁对学校造成了巨大损失。
description.en: The requirement for strategic relocation due to the Sino-Soviet split was one of the reasons for the forced relocation of the University of Science and Technology of China from Beijing, a move that caused immense losses to the university.

description.zh-cn: 八六学潮始于中国科学技术大学学生因不满合肥市西市区人大代表选举而发起的抗议游行。
description.en: The 1986 student protests began with a demonstration initiated by students of the University of Science and Technology of China in response to dissatisfaction with the election of deputies to the Xishi District People's Congress in Hefei.

description.zh-cn: 因八六学潮，时任中国科学技术大学校长管惟炎被撤职。
description.en: Following the 1986 student protests, Guan Weiyan, then president of the University of Science and Technology of China, was dismissed from his post.

description.zh-cn: 因八六学潮，时任中国科学技术大学副校长方励之被撤职。
description.en: Following the 1986 student protests, Fang Lizhi, then vice president of the University of Science and Technology of China, was dismissed from his post.

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平的支持下，中国科大被国务院批准为“七五”期间国家重点建设的十所高校之一。
description.en: With the support of Deng Xiaoping, USTC was approved by the State Council as one of the ten key universities for national development during the 'Seventh Five-Year Plan'.

description.zh-cn: 原合肥经济技术学院于1999年12月18日整建制并入中国科学技术大学。
description.en: The former Hefei College of Economics and Technology was fully merged into the University of Science and Technology of China on December 18, 1999.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学情报大学于1959年8月并入中国科学技术大学。
description.en: The China University of Science and Information was merged into the University of Science and Technology of China in August 1959.

description.zh-cn: 朱清时担任中国科学技术大学校长，任期长达10年，期间推动了学校的改革和发展。
description.en: Zhu Qingshi served as the president of the University of Science and Technology of China for 10 years, during which he promoted the university's reform and development.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记、国家主席的江泽民为中国科大四十周年校庆题词“面向二十一世纪，建设一流大学，培育一流人才”，给予了支持和肯定。
description.en: Jiang Zemin, then General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of China, wrote an inscription for the 40th anniversary of USTC: 'Facing the 21st century, build a first-class university and cultivate first-class talent,' showing his support and affirmation.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记、国家主席胡锦涛发来贺信，祝贺中国科学技术大学建校50周年，并勉励其“努力办成世界一流的研究型大学”。
description.en: Hu Jintao, then General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of China, sent a congratulatory letter for the 50th anniversary of USTC, encouraging it to 'strive to become a world-class research university'.

description.zh-cn: 史蒂芬·霍金于1985年在中国科学技术大学水上报告厅发表演讲。
description.en: Stephen Hawking gave a speech at the Waterborne Auditorium of the University of Science and Technology of China in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 汪洋拥有中国科学技术大学的在职研究生学历。
description.en: Wang Yang holds an in-service postgraduate degree from the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 李政道于1978年主持创办了中国科学技术大学的少年班。
description.en: Tsung-Dao Lee presided over the establishment of the Special Class for the Gifted Young at the University of Science and Technology of China in 1978.
